mapper.update: update tb_post set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_times = #{priceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, look_times = #{lookTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auth_range = #{authRange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, title, price_times, look_times, auth_range, create_time, deleted, topic_id, content from tb_post where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
